contentencoded:
Online payment company PayPal has released a new version of its mobile phone app for both Android and Apple's operating systems. It's the fifth such update and the company is hoping this version will make a big difference in a tricky area--mobile e-commerce. Chris Musto, Managing Director at Novantas, joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to discuss. 

Click the audio player above to hear more.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, September 6, 2013
teaser: PayPal hopes their new app change will help bolster the company's mobile e-commerce.
